price: Maka Kami tutup telinga mereka beberapa tahun dalam gua itu 873,
arabic: فَضَرَبۡنَا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاذَانِهِمۡ فِي ٱلۡكَهۡفِ سِنِينَ عَدَدٗا
footnotes: 873.  Maksudnya, Allah Subḥānahu wa Ta‘ālā  menidurkan mereka selama 309 tahun kamariah dalam gua itu (lihat ayat 25 surah ini), sehingga mereka tidak dapat dibangunkan oleh suara apa pun.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: faḍarabnā ʿalā ādhānihim fī al-kahfi sinīna ʿadadan
